rooms.name: Room Assigned on Arrival
rooms.description: Free Toiletries Safe Deposit Box Toilet Bathtub or Shower Wooden or parquet floor Towels Bed linen Socket close to bed Hypoallergenic Desk Sitting Area TV Slipper Telephone Tea/Coffee Maker Heating Hair dryer Electric Kettle Cable Channels Wake Up Service Wardrobe or closet Upper floors can be accessed by elevator. Clothes hanger Toilet paper Room-specific air conditioners in the unit
